description.narrative: The proposed investment is an equity participation in a newly created vehicle (Orazul Energia Partners LLC ) with I Squared Capital, to acquire the assets of Duke Energy International, an energy platform, located in Peru, Argentina, Chile, and Ecuador (Portfolio). The Portfolio consists of over 1,600 megawatts of operating hydroelectric and thermal power plants, transmission lines and gas-processing operations. IFC Global Infrastructure Fund, LP, an investment fund managed by IFC Asset Management Company, LLC, a wholly owned subsidiary of IFC, will invest alongside IFC. IFCs investment proceeds will be used to acquire and develop a portfolio of renewable power projects in Latin America. Through this investment, IFC will be supporting strategic partners which have demonstrated strong operational and management capacity in the power sector.
